name: Yizz-framework
body:
### Welcome to Yizz Framework page.

Obtain Yizz Framework
```
$ cd danipl/Yizz-Framework
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Authors and Contributors
[Daniel Pardo Ligorred](mailto:daniel@yizztech.com) @ [Yizz Technologies](http://www.yizztech.com/) 

### Support or Contact
Check out the documentation at [Yizz Framework Wiki](https://github.com/danipl/Yizz-Framework/wiki) or contact [Daniel Pardo Ligorred](mailto:daniel@yizztech.com) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
